Doc: A type defining an early termination provision where either or both parties have the right to exercise.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type defining an early termination provision where either or both parties have the right to exercise.
 #/
record FpML5.reporting.OptionalEarlyTermination {
  # If optional early termination is not available to both parties then this component specifies the buyer and seller of the option.
  singlePartyOption : FpML5.reporting.SinglePartyOption?

  # An placeholder for the actual option exercise definitions.
  exercise : FpML5.reporting.Exercise?

  # Definition of the party to whom notice of exercise should be given.
  exerciseNotice : FpML5.reporting.ExerciseNotice?

  # A flag to indicate whether follow-up confirmation of exercise (written or electronic) is required following telephonic notice by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent.
  followUpConfirmation : boolean?

  # The ISDA Calculation Agent responsible for performing duties associated with an optional early termination.
  calculationAgent : FpML5.reporting.CalculationAgent?

  # If specified, this means that cash settlement is applicable to the transaction and defines the parameters associated with the cash settlement prodcedure. If not specified, then physical settlement is applicable.
  cashSettlement : FpML5.reporting.CashSettlement?

  # An early termination provision to terminate the trade at fair value where one or both parties have the right to decide on termination.
  optionalEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates : FpML5.reporting.OptionalEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates?

}

singlePartyOption.Doc: If optional early termination is not available to both parties then this component specifies the buyer and seller of the option.
singlePartyOption.Name: singlePartyOption

exercise.Doc: An placeholder for the actual option exercise definitions.
exercise.Name: exercise

exerciseNotice.Doc: Definition of the party to whom notice of exercise should be given.
exerciseNotice.Name: exerciseNotice

followUpConfirmation.Doc: A flag to indicate whether follow-up confirmation of exercise (written or electronic) is required following telephonic notice by the buyer to the seller or seller's agent.
followUpConfirmation.Name: followUpConfirmation

calculationAgent.Doc: The ISDA Calculation Agent responsible for performing duties associated with an optional early termination.
calculationAgent.Name: calculationAgent

cashSettlement.Doc: If specified, this means that cash settlement is applicable to the transaction and defines the parameters associated with the cash settlement prodcedure. If not specified, then physical settlement is applicable.
cashSettlement.Name: cashSettlement

optionalEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates.Doc: An early termination provision to terminate the trade at fair value where one or both parties have the right to decide on termination.
optionalEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates.Name: optionalEarlyTerminationAdjustedDates
